name: Kuttey
description: A van carrying crores of cash. One rainy night in the outskirts of Mumbai. Unaware of each other, three stray gangs cross paths on the hunt. Unfortunately, all of them have the same plan. Bullets... Blood... Betrayal... It’s every man for himself... All the dogs after one bone. Will these dogs bite the bone, or will they lose to greed?

name: Panipat
description: During 18th century India, the Marathas emerged as the most powerful empire in the nation until the Afghan King Ahmad Shah Abdali plans to take over India. Sadashiv Rao Bhau is brought in to save the empire from the king which then leads to the third battle of Panipat.

name: India's Most Wanted
description: Officer Prabhat and his team arrive in Nepal to verify a terror suspect and arrest him within a deadline of four days. A race against time ensues when Pakistani agencies start chasing them.

name: Half Girlfriend
description: A boy meets a girl named Riya and falls in love. After struggling to convince her to be his girlfriend, she half-heartedly agrees to be his `half-girlfriend'.

name: 2 States
description: A man and a woman come from two very different cultural backgrounds, and decide that they won't get married until they convince their parents. As feared, differences between the families pose a hurdle.

name: Gunday
description: The lives of Calcutta's most powerful gangsters - Bikram and Bala, changes when Nandita enters it. Then a counter-force takes charge and a thriller unfolds.

name: Ishaqzaade
description: While fighting for the political supremacy of their respective families, a Hindu man and a Muslim woman share a forbidden romance.

name: Ki & Ka
description: An unconventional woman, gains immense success in her professional life but things take a turn when she meets a guy, who wants to be a house husband.

name: Aurangzeb
description: In order to expose Yashvardhan who is dishonest, Ravikant captures his son Ajay and plants his twin brother, Vishal, in his place, as an informer.

name: Sardar Ka Grandson
description: A devoted grandson's mission to reunite his ailing grandmother with her ancestral home turns into a complicated, comic cross-border affair.

name: Sandeep Aur Pinky Faraar
description: Sandeep, a bank executive & Pinky, a suspended cop, are marked for a kill. Phones tapped, accounts blocked, they escape but escaping is not freedom.

name: Mubarakan
description: Singleton Kartar Singh is left with the responsibility of raising his two orphaned nephews. He asks his brother in Punjab to raise Charan and his sister in London to raise Karan. When the twins cross continents, they leave behind a trail of confusion.

name: Namaste England
description: Param and Jasmeet fall in love and they get married. Their perfect romance gets disturbed by Jasmeet’s suppressed ambition however, she has dreams of going to London so that she can pursue her career and build a better life for herself. But Param unable to get a visa and that creates some high drama in their love life.

name: Bhavesh Joshi Superhero
description: A young man who stands for the right discovers that he's destined to do bigger things, which will transform him from a common man into a Superhero.

name: Tevar
description: A Kabaddi player rescues a young woman from an unwanted marriage and hides her in his home.
